About.paragraph: During my college days, I was very attracted to web applications because I wanted to understand the functionalities of a website and was curious to learn how a website could appear so interactive and responsive and how the backend operations take place.This led me to choosing full stack web development as my path. So, I joined Masai School and became a competitive programmer and a full-stack web developer.Now, I have hands-on experience in building websites and web applications. I specialize in JavaScript. As a Full-Stack web developer, I want to meet the requirements of the mocks and fulfill the user stories and make CRED operations for building user-friendly and dynamic websites.

Services.name: Clone of JioSaavn
Services.text: This project is a complete clone UI of the jioSaavn website.Tech-Stack used to build this website is React.js | Html | CSS | JS | Mock-Server | NPM Libraries.

Services.name: Clone of Dunzo using backend
Services.text: Dunzo is an e-commerce website that delivers groceries.Tech-Stack is used in which are HTML | CSS | Javascript | Express & Mongoose | Node | MongoDB | Razorpay

Services.name: Clone of Dunzo using local storage
Services.text: This is also a clone of Dunzo but it is based on local storage and it is only build in HTML | CSS | JavaScript and this is my first ever project in JavaScript.

Services.name: Grocery Management Store
Services.text: A functional to-do list to add, remove, toggle, and move groceries within lists and to other lists.In this project Tech-Stack used is HTML | CSS | Javascript | React.js.

Services.name: Book Store
Services.text: This is an Simple Book Store website where you can find the different books, you can search books, find details about author etc.The Tech-Stack is used to build this is | React.js | Routes | Links | HTML | CSS | JavaScript.

Services.name: Online Jewellery Store
Services.text: This an simple webapp where you can add any jewellery product in home page by entering some details of it like name,price and image,also you can add the product to cart and sort it by its price.Tech-Stack are HTML | CSS | Javascript.

Features.title: Html
Features.text: HTML is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser.

Features.title: Css
Features.text: CSS is designed to enable the separation of presentation and content, including layout, colors, and fonts.

Features.title: JavaScript
Features.text: JavaScript is used to enables interactive web pages and is an essential part of web applications.

Features.title: React
Features.text: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components.

Features.title: MongoDB
Features.text: MongoDB is a source-available cross-platform document-oriented database program. Classified as a NoSQL database program.

Features.title: Express js
Features.text: Express.js,is a back end web application framework for Node.js, released as free and open-source software under the MIT License.

Features.title: Node.js
Features.text: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform, back-end JavaScript runtime environment that runs on the V8 engine.

Features.title: Bootstrap
Features.text: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development..
